attributes.action: create a tax credit for profit-sharing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I urge you to implement a profitsharing system that is non-deferred,generous, frequent, and business-friendly. 
To be specific:
allow businesses to return up to 20% of net profits to employees regularly, and give that business a 60% tax credit for that return.   
This will quickly increase household income, and is a built-in stimulus!
It will change the global economy from the bottom up. It is a politically neutral concept, dovetailing the left and right.  It changes low paying jobs into well-paid partnerships.  
This is the answer to the global economy. It is the missing link in the world's search for an equitable economy.
John Huddleston, former IMF chief, agrees that a tax credit for profitsharing will restore confidence in the global economy.   Let's try testing it on a local basis first.
Investigate the "profitsharing uprising", it is beginning all over the world.
Dr. Darian Lance Smith
